title: 九宫格制作菜单将出现在PE版
author: xRPQx
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2016-1-18 21:57 编辑 

MCPE NEWS: PC Crafting Menu will be available in Minecraft Pocket Edition in the future
MCPE新闻:九宫格制作菜单即将在我的世界PE版登陆。







PC Crafting will be added to Minecraft Pocket Edition in the future. This will allow for expansive change in items crafting, and what inventory is available in game (as it develops and approaches the PC version) This will be a necessary change for many items that will come to Minecraft PE.  It will most likely come as an optional setting that users can change as they please.

The PC crafting model was one of the unique features that made Minecraft a special game and experience to many players when it became available to the public. Since the beginning, the Minecraft Pocket Edition community has requested that PC crafting be added into MCPE. An exclusive crafting system was created for Minecraft Pocket Edition due to the method of input (touch screens). Many players still crave the PC crafting system for their mobile devices. Here’s what the crafting menu looks like on PC:Crafting3x3There’s a 3 x 3 grid that the player can drag and drop materials in specific patterns and quantities to craft an item or block. All items are crafted through this menu, which is unavailable in Minecraft Pocket Edition. All recipes and combinations are handled automatically in MCPE, with the tap of a button to confirm a craft.
那种和电脑一样的制作菜单，即将被添加到PE中去。它的加入将是一个必要的改变。这个模式（九宫格模式）是玩家可以自由切换的。

电脑工作台的独特功能使我的世界变成一个特殊的游戏,它让玩家变得自由。2015年初以来,社区很多玩家要求添加到MCPE电脑制作。但由于PE的屏幕触摸方式。许多人希望用九宫格制作物品。电脑版的工作台是一个3×3的空间,玩家可以拖放材料制作东西。所有项目都通过这个菜单制。但是在这之前。所有物品在MCPE自动处理,轻轻一按，就做好了。



　　http://mcpenews.com/pc-crafting-in-mcpe/
